summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 3, College Addition and the north and south alley in block 4, University Place Addition, being the alley between 20th Avenue Northeast and 21st Avenue Northeast, extending from East 61st Street to East 63rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
